nodes.text: Locru's Central Saloon was a cantina near the center of Tun Aduban on Aduba-3. It was founded by Locru. It also served as an inn, charging twelve credits a night.
Frequent customers included Warto and Azoora.
It was here that Han Solo and Chewbacca recruited spacers to fight Serji-X Arrogantus, forming the Eight for Aduba-3.
If approached from the direction of Spacer's Hill, it was the third structure to the left past the Town Circle.
A set of stairs led up from the bar to the lobby, adjacent to which were bedrooms where customers could stay.
